mapper.sql: SELECT id, provider_id, user_id, good_id, variety_amount, unit_cost, amount, sum, check_conclusion, time, clearing_form, handler FROM tb_stock
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_stock( id, provider_id, user_id, good_id, variety_amount, unit_cost, amount, sum, check_conclusion, time, clearing_form, handler) VALUE(#{id}, #{providerInfo.id},#{user.id},#{goodInfo.id}, #{varietyAmount},#{unitCost}, #{amount},#{sum}, #{checkConclusion},#{time},#{clearingForm}, #{handler})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_stock SET provider_id=#{providerInfo.id}, good_id=#{goodInfo.id}, user_id=#{user.id}, variety_amount=#{varietyAmount}, unit_cost=#{unitCost}, amount=#{amount}, sum=#{sum}, check_conclusion =#{checkConclusion}, time=#{time}, clearing_form=#{clearingForm}, handler=#{handler} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_stock JOIN tb_provider_info ON tb_provider_info.id = tb_stock.provider_id JOIN tb_user ON tb_user.account = tb_stock.user_id JOIN tb_good_info ON tb_good_info.id = tb_stock.good_id
tb_stock.time >= #{startTime} AND tb_stock.time <= #{endTime} AND tb_provider_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ProviderName},'%') AND tb_good_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{GoodName},'%') AND tb_user.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{UserName},'%')
